title: The Greatest Art Movement: Transporting Art: the Story of Melbourne's Art Trams
other_title: The Greatest Art Movement: Transporting Art: the Story of Melbournes Art Trams
creator_contributor_role: National Heart Foundation of Australia. Victorian Division, production company
abstract: Melbourne's Transporting Art Project gave the city it's much-loved art trams, carrying the work of Australian artists on the tram tracks.
description: Trams have always been a feature of Melbourne life and they have now been transformed into moving art galleries. Melbourne's Transporting Art Project involves a new series of decorated trams. Several of the artists discuss their reasons for taking part in the scheme, the themes behind their work and the unusual medium. Artists include Aleks Danko, Philip Faulks, Lin Onus, Terry Matassoni, Jenny Watson and Brett Colquhoun.
active_carriers_public_types_and_formats: MOV file H264; ACMI Digital Access Copy - presentation
